title: 葱油有何看法 - 司法诉讼: 微信苟延残喘的最后一线生机？
contents:
https://sanfrancisco.cbslocal.com/2020/09/19/hearing-federal-judge-wechat-motion/

旧金山联邦法庭的法官已经表示 愿意审查由一个微信用户组织和6个独立微信用户提出 要求法院阻止川普政府禁止微信的请求

原告的理由之一
"The plaintiffs contended that by prohibiting third-party services such as web hosting and internet transit services, WeChat will be effectively be shut down, depriving millions of Chinese-speaking Americans of the primary platform they can use to communicate and interact with friends and family in China."

另一侧 听证会后 法官就会做出是否受理的判决
https://www.ktvu.com/news/wechat-hearing-held-in-san-francisco-judge-expected-issue-ruling-later-today
